hero.header: Mitra Terpercaya Anda dalam Pelayanan Maklon Berkualitas Tinggi
hero.subHeader: Spesialisasi dalam produksi barang-barang berlabel pribadi berkualitas tinggi, kami menawarkan solusi manufaktur yang disesuaikan untuk memenuhi kebutuhan bisnis Anda.

expertiseHero.subHeader: Kami tidak hanya memproduksi produk anda, tetapi juga membantu anda membangun produk dari awal

customFormulation.title: Formulasi Kustom
customFormulation.description: Kami menawarkan layanan formulasi khusus menggunakan bahan berkualitas tinggi, memastikan visi unik Anda menjadi nyata.

blendingAndPackaging.title: Pencampuran dan Pengemasan
blendingAndPackaging.description: Fasilitas canggih kami menangani berbagai opsi pencampuran dan pengemasan untuk disesuaikan dengan jenis dan jumlah produk yang berbeda.

qualityAssurance.title: Jaminan Kualitas
qualityAssurance.description: Kami mematuhi langkah-langkah kontrol kualitas yang ketat dan standar industri, menjamin bahwa produk Anda aman, konsisten, dan patuh.

privateLabelSolution.title: Solusi Label Pribadi
privateLabelSolution.description: Perluas merek Anda dengan layanan label pribadi kami. Dari konsep hingga rak, kami mendukung Anda di setiap langkah.

feature.subHeader: Mengapa Bermitra Dengan Green Life Harvest?

legalCompletness.title: Kelengkapan Sertifikat
legalCompletness.description: Green Life Harvest telah memberikan sertifikasi terkemuka untuk memastikan kualitas kami sesuai dengan visi Anda. Sertifikasi kami meliputi <black>BPOM, Halal, ISO 22000, ISO 22716, ISO 9001, HAACP, CPOTB, CPKB, CPPOB</black>, dan <black>Sertifikasi GMP</black>

experience.title: Pengalaman 20 Tahun
experience.description: <black>20 tahun pengalaman</black> kami menjadikan kami sebagai salah satu layanan Maklon paling andal dengan <black>1000+ pengusaha dan merek</black> memercayai kami untuk mewujudkan visi mereka.

lowMoq.title: Kualitas Tinggi dengan Persyaratan MOQ Rendah
lowMoq.description: Kami mengutamakan kualitas di atas segalanya saat membuat produk Anda. Fasilitas canggih kami memastikan hanya bahan berkualitas tinggi yang digunakan. Selain itu, kami dapat mengakomodasi MOQ rendah untuk produk Anda.

video.header: Kami berkomitmen untuk menjadi mitra terbaik untuk pertumbuhan brand Anda.
video.subHeader: <bold>Greenlife Harvest Group</bold> adalah produsen label swasta terkemuka yang mengkhususkan diri pada produk herbal, suplemen, dan kosmetik sejak tahun 2004. Dipercaya oleh ratusan merek, produk kami menjangkau lebih dari 50 negara di seluruh dunia.

productAvailable.header: Produk Khusus Tersedia di Harvest Group

1.title: Minuman Fiber
1.description: Boost digestive health with high-fiber drinks tailored to your brand's needs. Our fiber-based formulations help in maintaining gut health and provide essential nutrients for daily wellness.

2.title: Meal Replacement
2.description: Create balanced meal replacement products that offer complete nutrition for those on the go. Our options include protein-packed shakes and fortified powders to support weight management and fitness goals.

3.title: Skincare & Cosmetics
3.description: Develop premium skincare and cosmetic products, from cleansers and moisturizers to specialized treatments. Our formulations focus on efficacy and safety, ensuring high customer satisfaction.

4.title: Minuman Kolagen
4.description: Support beauty from within with our collagen-based drinks, designed to enhance skin elasticity and hydration. We provide customizable formulas rich in peptides and vitamins for optimal results.

5.title: Susu Kolostrum
5.description: Leverage the power of colostrum for immune support with our specialized colostrum milk products. Rich in antibodies and growth factors, these products are perfect for health-focused brands.

6.title: Whey Protein
6.description: Formulate high-quality whey protein products for fitness enthusiasts and athletes. Our whey protein options come in various flavors and compositions, ideal for muscle recovery and strength building.

1.question: Berapa minimum order (MOQ) di Harvest Group
1.answer: MOQ & minimum order di Harvest Group cukup rendah. Anda dapat membuat Produk Minuman Kesehatan Maklon, herbal, suplemen atau kosmetik/skincare secara legal sesuai keinginan & permintaan Anda.

2.question: Apa itu Maklon?
2.answer: Maklon is taken from the Dutch language, namely makloon, which means manufacturing fee. However, the realization is a service provider that has its own rules & provides production services with formulations according to consumer demand. Usually the products that are maklon such as herbal in the form of tablets, health food and drinks in the form of powder & the ones that are currently popular are beauty cosmetics & skincare products.

3.question: Dimana alamat Harvest Group?
3.answer:
We have 4 manufacturers & factories located in 1 area, namely: 

 Era Prima Warehouse and Industrial Complex Jl. Daan Mogot KM 21 No. 1 Block Q1 Kel, RT.001/RW.001, Poris Plawad, Cipondoh, Tangerang City, Banten 15141, Indonesia.

4.question: Bagaimana cara meminta sampel produk Maklon?
4.answer:
You can contact our Marketing Division for consultation regarding product concepts, and request Product Samples according to the Formula you want. 

 Making Maklon Product Samples with us is free without any costs. 

 For those of you who do not have a concept & formula, you don't need to worry, because our marketing support is ready to provide ideas & formula concepts based on the benefits you want.

5.question: Bisakah Harvest Group membuat produk persis seperti produk yang sudah ada?
5.answer: Of course it is possible. Our Research & Development Expert Team has experience in making thousands of products with various formulations. We will even design a unique formula for each product, so that it has strong characteristics and seeks the characteristics of a product.

6.question: Berapa lama perkiraan waktu produksi di Maklon Harvest Group?
6.answer: The first Maklon Production Process is different for each Maklon Division, but for the 2nd PO or Repeat Order, the production process only takes 2-3 weeks after order confirmation.

lastBanner.header: Buat Produk yang Disesuaikan untuk Merek Anda
lastBanner.subHeader: Berkolaborasi dengan kami untuk mengembangkan produk premium yang melibatkan pelanggan Anda. Kami menjamin kualitas, keamanan, dan kepatuhan di setiap tahap.

footer.aboutHarvest: Harvest Group is a premier MAKLON manufacturer in Indonesia and Malaysia, specializing in a diverse array of health food products, nutritional supplements, and our latest offering in cosmetics and skincare production.
